p: MERRA-2 data is available from the Goddard Earth Science Data and Information Services Center ( https://disc.sci.gsfc.nasa.gov/), AERONET data is available from https://aeronet.gsfc.nasa.gov/, GFED4 is available from http://www.globalfiredata.org/, and NEI is available from https://www.epa.gov/sites/production/files/2016–12/state_tier1_90–16.xls.
